content:
Hi everyone, a quick message to invite everyone to the upcoming Dataverse Community Call on Feb 3 2026 at 10:00AM ET https://dataverse.org/community-calls. I will be showcasing the new expanded geospatial metadata block based on the ISO 19115 metadata standard, now available for open review (see PR# https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11507).

We are super excited about this new development for the community and I hope you can make it! :)

Sneak preview of new DV geospatial metadata (2026)
Screenshot 2026-01-28 at 3.27.14â€¯PM.png
block --

Shoot, I forgot to link to this post when I sent this announcement: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/rA5tdZfauvQ/m/aQTB_X_YBAAJ

I'll try to remember to link to it when I send a reminder on Monday.

Can't wait! Plus we have a talk by @Paul Boon on Geonames!
I updated the agenda to link to this Zulip topic, at least.

Thanks again, Amber and Paul, for your lovely presentations!

I just put the recording on DataverseTV:Â https://dataverse.org/dataversetv
